name: size
description: The size of this transaction in bytes

name: virtual_size
description: The virtual transaction size (differs from size for witness transactions)

name: version
description: Protocol version specified in block which contained this transaction

name: lock_time
description: Earliest time that miners can include the transaction in their hashing of the Merkle root to attach it in the latest block of the blockchain

name: block_hash
description: Hash of the block which contains this transaction

name: block_number
description: Number of the block which contains this transaction

name: block_timestamp
description: Timestamp of the block which contains this transaction

name: block_timestamp_month
description: Month of the block which contains this transaction

name: input_count
description: The number of inputs in the transaction

name: output_count
description: The number of outputs in the transaction

name: input_value
description: Total value of inputs in the transaction

name: output_value
description: Total value of outputs in the transaction

name: is_coinbase
description: true if this transaction is a coinbase transaction

name: fee
description: The fee paid by this transaction

fields.name: index
fields.description: 0-indexed number of an input within a transaction

fields.name: spent_transaction_hash
fields.description: The hash of the transaction which contains the output that this input spends

fields.name: spent_output_index
fields.description: The index of the output this input spends

fields.name: script_asm
fields.description: Symbolic representation of the bitcoin's script language op-codes

fields.name: script_hex
fields.description: Hexadecimal representation of the bitcoin's script language op-codes

fields.name: sequence
fields.description: A number intended to allow unconfirmed time-locked transactions to be updated before being finalized; not currently used except to disable locktime in a transaction

fields.name: required_signatures
fields.description: The number of signatures required to authorize the spent output

fields.name: type
fields.description: The address type of the spent output

fields.name: addresses
fields.description: Addresses which own the spent output

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value in base currency attached to the spent output

fields.name: index
fields.description: 0-indexed number of an output within a transaction used by a later transaction to refer to that specific output

fields.name: script_asm
fields.description: Symbolic representation of the bitcoin's script language op-codes

fields.name: script_hex
fields.description: Hexadecimal representation of the bitcoin's script language op-codes

fields.name: required_signatures
fields.description: The number of signatures required to authorize spending of this output

fields.name: type
fields.description: The address type of the output

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value in base currency attached to this output
